attributes.action: say no to the proposed Mosque at the Olympic Village
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to take steps to prevent the building a of a large Mosque at the Olympic Village.  This is an obvious Political request and provocative in it's nature.

rejection.details: No planning permission has been requested and no application received for a mosque as described in this petition.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
